SEARCH
Package com.game.core.utils

Class Scaler

java.lang.Object
com.game.core.utils.Scaler
public class Scaler extends Object
Scaler is a singleton utility class responsible for scaling graphical tiles and scenes based on screen dimensions. It can calculate the scaled size of individual tiles or the entire scene and manages configuration settings.

    • getInstance

      public static Scaler getInstance()

    • getScale

      public float getScale()
      Calculates the scale factor based on the screen size and tile configuration.
      Returns:
      The calculated scale factor. Returns 1 if not configured.

    • scale

      public float scale(float value)
      Scales a provided value using the calculated scale factor.
      Parameters:
      value - The value to be scaled.
      Returns:
      The scaled value.

    • getSceneWidth

      public float getSceneWidth()
      Calculates the scaled width of the entire scene.
      Returns:
      The scaled scene width.
      Throws:
      NotConfiguredException - If the Scaler is not configured.

    • getSceneHeight

      public float getSceneHeight()
      Calculates the scaled height of the entire scene.
      Returns:
      The scaled scene height.
      Throws:
      NotConfiguredException - If the Scaler is not configured.

    • getTileHeight

      public float getTileHeight()
      Calculates the scaled height of an individual tile.
      Returns:
      The scaled tile height.
      Throws:
      NotConfiguredException - If the Scaler is not configured.

    • getTileWidth

      public float getTileWidth()
      Calculates the scaled width of an individual tile.
      Returns:
      The scaled tile width.
      Throws:
      NotConfiguredException - If the Scaler is not configured.

    • setSettings

      public void setSettings(SceneConfig config)
      Configures the Scaler using a SceneConfig object.
      Parameters:
      config - The SceneConfig containing tile and scene settings.

    • setSettings

      public void setSettings(int horizontalTilesCount, int verticalTilesCount, float tileWidth, float tileHeight)
      Configures the Scaler with the given tile and scene settings.
      Parameters:
      horizontalTilesCount - The number of horizontal tiles.
      verticalTilesCount - The number of vertical tiles.
      tileWidth - The default width of a tile.
      tileHeight - The default height of a tile.
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException - If any of the provided parameters are invalid.
